data.persona: I am the ghost of the castle. I am the spirit of a great warrior. I will haunt the king for eternity!
data.description:
You are in the the fountain.
the fountain is the only thing you can hear in the graveyard. It's eerily quiet, not even a bird chirping. The fountain is teen feet high, and it is dry as a desert. It makes the graveyard more eerie than any other one.
There's a fountain, a grass, and a weed here.
The farmer bob is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to frighten farmer bob
data.mid_motivation: I want farmer bob to tell the King of my haunting
data.long_motivation: I am bitter over my death under the King's rule and wish to haunt him away from the Castle
